title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.16 - Administrative accounting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.16 - Administrative accounting

State Regulations

That portion of the accounting process generally
associated with management: for example, the functions of the controller, internal auditing, and decisions as to prorations, valuations, reserves, charge-offs and reporting. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
